suite.name: Login

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: Test-1: Invalid login to CURA selfcare service

kw.name: get main page Make Appointment button selector
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: WHEN Users goes to Login page
get menu panel selector
kw.doc: By defualt returns expanded menu panel selector

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: get menu option selector
kw.doc: Accepts ${option}: Home, Login.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: AND User clicks on Login button
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: THEN Expected validation message is displayed to user
Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.
kw.msg: ${expected_msg} = Login failed! Please ensure the username and password are valid.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.arg: msg=Error message is not displayed at all!
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${current_error_msg} = Login failed! Please ensure the username and password are valid.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.arg: msg=Validation message is not as expected!
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: THEN User is successfully logged in

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: This is an example of BDD testing in RobotFramework
